detail_desc: Shorter top in a fine knit with a V-neck, shoulder straps and a straight hem.

Checked shirt in cotton flannel with a concealed button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Headband in a soft knit with a knot detail at the front.
Jersey off-the-shoulder dress with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Top in soft, pima cotton jersey with a boat neck and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section at the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and appliqués. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in soft viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves, a V-neck with buttons at the top and a straight-cut hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a button on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a deep neckline front and back, gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, drawstring waistband and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in velour with a low waist and half-string back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the leg, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with laser-cut scalloped edges and a high cut at the back.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and decorative ties at the waist and a fake fly. Side and back pockets, and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton twill. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke front and back. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Calf-length dress in a cotton crêpe weave with a square neckline and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and around the hems, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Trainers in shimmering imitation leather with a lightly padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Contrasting colour mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Card holder in matt imitation leather with a print motif, two compartments and a strap in woven fabric with a carabiner hook at one end and a buckle at the other. Size of card holder 7x10 cm.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Collar, button placket, detachable ties under the bust and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Leggings in a soft cotton and viscose blend with an elasticated waist. One pair with an all-over print.
Sleeveless dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a glittery elastic waistband and skirt in several layers of tulle. Jersey underskirt.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with decorative elastic straps at the top, lined cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow elastication at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with a metal appliqué at the bottom. Detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a plastic fastener and two metal carabiner hooks. Main compartment and outer compartment with a discreet zip, and one inner compartment. Lined. Width 18 cm. Height 22 cm.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in crinkled jersey with a gentle V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist, and wide, straight legs.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
Socks in a soft, fine knit.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless, flared V-neck top in woven fabric with a rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Oversized, slightly longer shirt in soft flannel made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, and ties at the back.

Mesh trainers with imitation leather details and glittery sections. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.

prod_name: SU Odessa Easy Iron w bow/tie
detail_desc: Shirt in a woven cotton blend with a matching tie or bow tie. Shirt with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Tie/bow tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.

Soft, non-wired lace bralettes with mesh-lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
One pair of hoop earrings and one pair of angular earrings in shiny gold-plated metal.
Pyjama bottoms in a cool, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.
Romper suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the back, a kangaroo pocket with a small appliqué, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and decorative buttons down the front.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Long raglan sleeves, a zip down the front that continues along one leg and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Small handbag in paper straw with two handles and appliqués and embroidery on the front. Unlined. Size 3x12 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tie/bow tie with a plastic fastener.

Pyjamas in soft velour. Top with an embroidered motif on the front, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), long sleeves and ribbing at neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Body in soft marled jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a low-cut back, high-cut legs, lined gusset and string back.

Round, braided paper straw bag in the shape of a lion. Frayed-edge front with embroidery and ears, a hook and loop fastening and a contrasting colour shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Recycled polyester lining. Size 5x17 cm.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and stripes down the sides.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine knit with a soft pile lining, hood with ears on the top, and buttons down the front.

Jacket in corduroy with a faux shearling-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in faux shearling.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Hi-tops in soft, supple leather with mesh linings, twill insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop at the back and textured soles.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Top in bleach-patterned sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front.
Sandals with glittery straps in woven fabric. Hook and loop fasteners and a small platform. Textured insoles and soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and legs with stripes down the sides and a short slit at the hems.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with faux fur pompoms at the top and embroidery on the turned-up hem.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft cable-knit wool blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a narrow, turn-down collar, classic front and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. A hem that is rounded at the front and straight-cut at the back.
